scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:SEO_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="Title" defaultValue="${resource:Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="enableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations" labelResourceName="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations" descriptionResourceName="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="true"> <propertyValue labelText="Enable" value="true" propertiesToShow="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" /> <propertyValue labelText="Disable" value="false" propertiesToHide="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" /> </property> <property id="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" labelResourceName="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" descriptionResourceName="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore_Description" dataType="String" rows="10" defaultValue="" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CanonicalUrl">Canonical URL</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrl_Description">If specified this will set the URL used in the canonical link tag.</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore">Query Key Canonical URL Registrations to Ignore</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore_Description">Identify query string keys, one per line, to ignore when generating the canonical URL.</resource> <resource name="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations">Query Key Canonical URL Registrations</resource> <resource name="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations_Description">When enabled, widgets on the page can register query string keys to be added to the canonical URL (for example, page indexes).</resource> <resource name="If specified this will override the default url used in the canonical link tag. By default the canonical url is the page's current base url."></resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="SEO_Description">Enables adjustment of SEO metadata</resource> <resource name="SEO_Name">SEO Meta Data</resource> <resource name="Title">SEO Meta Data</resource> </language>
